UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of pleurocidin is retained in Plc-2, a C-terminal 12-amino acid fragment.
Literature.Author: Souza AL, Díaz-Dellavalle P, Cabrera A, Larranaga P, Dalla-Rizza M, De-Simone SG
